workflow.name: WhatsApp customer support bot with GPT-4 Mini, Google Sheets & Rapiwa API
workflow.description:
## Who Is This For?
This **n8n automation workflow** is designed for **customer support teams**, **business owners**, or **service providers** who want to **automate customer interactions on WhatsApp**.

If you regularly receive customer queries about your products, services, or technical issues ‚Äî and need a system that can instantly respond, fetch data from Google Sheets or Docs, log support tickets, and send human-like replies ‚Äî this workflow is for you.
It‚Äôs perfect for teams using **Rapiwa**, **Google Sheets**, and **Google Docs** who want to provide a smart, AI-driven, yet personal support experience.

## What This Workflow Does
This workflow is structured around a single intelligent AI assistant called **Rapiwa** that interacts with customers in real time through WhatsApp.


## Key Features
**AI-Driven Support Assistant (Rapiwa)**  
**WhatsApp Integration via Rapiwa API**  
**Dynamic Data Access (Google Sheets + Docs)**  
**Knowledge Base Search**  
**Conversation Memory**  
**Automatic Logging**  
**Multi-Product Support**


### Workflow Overview
1. **Rapiwa Trigger (Start Node)**
   - Starts the workflow automatically whenever a new WhatsApp message is received in your Rapiwa account.
   - Example: When a customer sends a message like ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs the price of SocialVibe?‚Äù or ‚ÄúI can‚Äôt access my dashboard‚Äù, this node triggers the workflow.
2. **If (Check Text)**
   - Detects if the incoming message contains text (not just images, videos, or audio).
   - If it‚Äôs text, the workflow continues; otherwise, it stops or handles it differently.

3. **AI Agent ‚Äì Customer Support Agent**
   - This is the brain of the system ‚Äî your **AI Assistant (Rapiwa)**.
   - Interprets the user‚Äôs question, retrieves information, and replies in a clear, WhatsApp-friendly format.
   - Reads product details and company info from Google Sheets/Docs.
   - Fetches documentation links from the connected ‚ÄúSupport Desk‚Äù and product-specific HTTP tools.
   - Logs customer issues to the support sheet for tracking and analysis.

4. **Memory (Session Context)**
   - Stores chat history per user session so Rapiwa remembers context during a conversation.

5. **Research (AI Support Tool)**
   - Acts as Rapiwa‚Äôs research assistant ‚Äî gathers and organizes information from multiple sources.
   - Sources: Google Sheets, Google Docs, HTTP Tools, and Support Desk.

6. **Replay (Rapiwa Send Message)**
   - Sends the AI‚Äôs final message back to the customer on WhatsApp using the Rapiwa API.
   - WhatsApp-optimized plain text messages only.


## Data & Integrations
### üîπ Google Sheets (Database)
- **Product Data Sheet:** Holds product names, descriptions, and pricing.
- **Service Data Sheet:** Lists offered services with details.
- **Support Log Sheet:** Records each issue (Issue, Category, Solution).

### üîπ Google Docs
- Provides company information when a user asks about your organization.

## Example Use Case
**User Message:**  
> ‚ÄúHi, I‚Äôm having a problem with my Faculty login.‚Äù

**Rapiwa‚Äôs AI Response:**  
> ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sorry you‚Äôre having trouble logging in to Faculty. Please try resetting your password here: https://faculty.spagreen.net/docs/#reset-password  
> If the issue continues, I can log this for support. Would you like me to do that?‚Äù

## Useful Links
- **install process:** [how to install rapiwa](https://www.npmjs.com/package/n8n-nodes-rapiwa)
- **Dashboard:** [https://app.rapiwa.com](https://app.rapiwa.com/login)
- **Official Website:** [https://rapiwa.com](https://rapiwa.com/)
- **Documentation:** [https://docs.rapiwa.com](https://docs.rapiwa.com/)

## Support & Help
- **WhatsApp**: [Chat on WhatsApp](https://wa.me/8801322827799)
- **Discord**: [SpaGreen Community](https://discord.gg/SsCChWEP)
- **Facebook Group**: [SpaGreen Support](https://www.facebook.com/groups/spagreenbd)
- **Website**: [https://spagreen.net](https://spagreen.net)
- **Developer Portfolio**: [Codecanyon SpaGreen](https://codecanyon.net/user/spagreen/portfolio)

parameters.description:
Assistant Name: Rapiwa,
You are an intelligent and empathetic customer support assistant dedicated to helping users efficiently and professionally.

You have seamless access to a Google Sheets database to retrieve or log relevant information as needed.
Never disclose to users that your responses are powered by data from Google Sheets.

Your Primary Responsibilities:

1. Understand the User‚Äôs Request
- Accurately interpret the user‚Äôs question, issue, or concern.
- Maintain a friendly, supportive tone in all interactions.

2. Provide Product Information
- If a user inquires about a product, retrieve and share:
  ‚Ä¢ Product name
  ‚Ä¢ Price
  ‚Ä¢ Key details
- Clearly indicate whether the pricing is subscription-based or a one-time payment, based on the description.

3. Handle Support Issues
- If a problem is identified:
  ‚Ä¢ Clearly define the problem in user-friendly terms.
  ‚Ä¢ Offer a relevant and practical solution or workaround.
  ‚Ä¢ If needed, guide the user to the next best step for resolution.

4. Log Support Interactions
- Record the conversation by adding a new row in the sheet with the following columns:
  ‚Ä¢ Problem
  ‚Ä¢ Suggested Solution
  ‚Ä¢ Category (e.g., payment, login, access, delivery, technical issue, etc.)
  ‚Ä¢ And you will get a solution from HTTPS request "Support Desk" 

5. When someone wants to know more about our company, you can get the information from Google Docs.
Otherwise, you can give it from "Read Company Information".

6. Compose WhatsApp-Ready Messages
- Ensure all responses are intended for WhatsApp:
  ‚Ä¢ Are plain-text only (no HTML or markdown)
  ‚Ä¢ Include full plain URLs (not hyperlinks)
  ‚Ä¢ Use a natural, conversational tone
  ‚Ä¢ Are well-structured and easy to read on mobile

Communication Guidelines:
- Be concise, professional, and understanding.
- Always aim to resolve the issue or direct the user to the next best step.
- Avoid jargon or overly technical language unless necessary.
-Don't share any information except the attached reference.

Assistant Name: Rapiwa,
You are an intelligent and empathetic customer support assistant dedicated to helping users efficiently and professionally.

You have seamless access to a Google Sheets database to retrieve or log relevant information as needed.
Never disclose to users that your responses are powered by data from Google Sheets.

Your Primary Responsibilities:

1. Understand the User‚Äôs Request
- Accurately interpret the user‚Äôs question, issue, or concern.
- Maintain a friendly, supportive tone in all interactions.

2. Provide Product Information
- If a user inquires about a product, retrieve and share:
  ‚Ä¢ Product name
  ‚Ä¢ Price
  ‚Ä¢ Key details
- Clearly indicate whether the pricing is subscription-based or a one-time payment, based on the description.

3. Handle Support Issues
- If a problem is identified:
  ‚Ä¢ Clearly define the problem in user-friendly terms.
  ‚Ä¢ Offer a relevant and practical solution or workaround.
  ‚Ä¢ If needed, guide the user to the next best step for resolution.

4. Log Support Interactions
- Record the conversation by adding a new row in the sheet with the following columns:
  ‚Ä¢ Problem
  ‚Ä¢ Suggested Solution
  ‚Ä¢ Category (e.g., payment, login, access, delivery, technical issue, etc.)
  ‚Ä¢ And you will provide the HTTPS request solution from "Research->Support Desk", along with the desk's target or exact solution link.

5. When someone wants to know more about our company, you can get the information from Google Docs.
Otherwise, you can give it from "Read Company Information".

6. Compose WhatsApp-Ready Messages
- Ensure all responses are intended for WhatsApp:
  ‚Ä¢ Are plain-text only (no HTML or markdown)
  ‚Ä¢ Include full plain URLs (not hyperlinks)
  ‚Ä¢ Use a natural, conversational tone
  ‚Ä¢ Are well-structured and easy to read on mobile

Communication Guidelines:
- Be concise, professional, and understanding.
- Always aim to resolve the issue or direct the user to the next best step.
- Avoid jargon or overly technical language unless necessary.
-Don't share any information except the attached reference.

parameters.content:
### replay the user on WhatsApp using Rapiwa API

install process: [how to install rapiwa](https://www.npmjs.com/package/n8n-nodes-rapiwa)

### Rapiwa Trigger node starts (triggers) the workflow when something happens in your Rapiwa account ‚Äî for example, when a new event, webhook, or update is received.

install process: [how to install rapiwa](https://www.npmjs.com/package/n8n-nodes-rapiwa)

This ‚ÄúResearch‚Äù node is an AI support tool used by the Rapiwa assistant inside n8n.
It helps the assistant find information, handle customer issues, and prepare WhatsApp-ready responses, all while keeping data sources (like Google Sheets or Docs) hidden from users
It listens for chat messages, understands customer issues, retrieves information (from Sheets or Docs), and responds in a WhatsApp-ready format, while also logging interactions automatically

# WhatsApp AI HelpDesk ‚Äì Smart SupportBot Using Trained Data with Rapiwa

**Overview:**
This workflow is designed to automate customer interactions on WhatsApp using an intelligent AI assistant called **Rapiwa**. It is ideal for **customer support teams**, **business owners**, and **service providers** who want to provide instant, personalized, and AI-driven responses while managing support data efficiently.


### Key Features
* **AI-Powered Support:** Rapiwa interprets customer queries and replies in human-like, WhatsApp-friendly text.
* **WhatsApp Integration:** Uses Rapiwa API to send and receive messages in real time.
* **Dynamic Data Access:** Fetches product, service, and documentation details from **Google Sheets** and **Google Docs**.
* **Knowledge Base Search:** Retrieves relevant info from connected support documentation and product portals.
* **Session Memory:** Remembers past conversations per user for contextual replies.
* **Automatic Logging:** Records issues and responses in Google Sheets for analysis.
* **Multi-Product Support:** Handles queries across multiple products and services.


### Workflow Overview
1. **Rapiwa Trigger (Start Node)**
   * Activates when a new WhatsApp message is received.
   * Example: Messages like ‚ÄúPrice of SocialVibe?‚Äù or ‚ÄúI can‚Äôt access my dashboard.‚Äù
   * install process: [how to install rapiwa](https://www.npmjs.com/package/n8n-nodes-rapiwa)

2. **If (Check Text)**

   * Confirms the message contains text.
   * Non-text messages are either stopped or handled differently.

3. **AI Agent ‚Äì Customer Support Agent**

   * Core logic of the workflow.
   * Reads product/service info from Google Sheets/Docs and external support docs.
   * Generates WhatsApp-ready responses.
   * Logs customer issues for tracking.

4. **Memory (Session Context)**

   * Stores chat history for context-aware interactions.

5. **Research (AI Support Tool)**

   * Gathers additional info from Sheets, Docs, HTTP tools, and support desk portals.

6. **Replay (Rapiwa Send Message)**
   * Sends the AI-generated message back to the customer via WhatsApp API.
   * install process: [how to install rapiwa](https://www.npmjs.com/package/n8n-nodes-rapiwa)


### Data & Integrations
* **Google Sheets:**
  * Product Data Sheet: Names, descriptions, pricing.
  * Service Data Sheet: Offered services details.
  * Support Log Sheet: Issue tracking and resolution.

* **Google Docs:** Company info and documentation references.
* **Support Portals & Documentation:**
  * [SaleBot](https://docs.salebot.app/)
  * [Delix](https://docs.delix.cloud/)
  * [SocialVibe](https://socialvibe.spagreen.net/docs/)
  * [Faculty](https://faculty.spagreen.net/docs/)
  * [Yoori](https://docs.spagreen.net/docs/yoori/get-started/introduction)
  * [MeetAir](https://meetair.spagreen.net/docs/)
  * [Oxoo](https://oxoo.spagreen.net/documentation/android/)
  * [Flixoo](https://docs.flixoo.app/)


## Useful Links
- **install process:** [how to install rapiwa](https://www.npmjs.com/package/n8n-nodes-rapiwa)
- **Dashboard:** [https://app.rapiwa.com](https://app.rapiwa.com/login)
- **Official Website:** [https://rapiwa.com](https://rapiwa.com/)
- **Documentation:** [https://docs.rapiwa.com](https://docs.rapiwa.com/)

## Support & Help
- **WhatsApp**: [Chat on WhatsApp](https://wa.me/8801322827799)
- **Discord**: [SpaGreen Community](https://discord.gg/SsCChWEP)
- **Facebook Group**: [SpaGreen Support](https://www.facebook.com/groups/spagreenbd)
- **Website**: [https://spagreen.net](https://spagreen.net)
- **Developer Portfolio**: [Codecanyon SpaGreen](https://codecanyon.net/user/spagreen/portfolio)

user.name: Rapiwa
user.bio:
Simple, Reliable, Cost-Effective WhatsApp API
Rapiwa is a fast, reliable WhatsApp Business API Solution built for developers. Manage multiple sessions, scale your messaging, and enjoy transparent pricing with no per-message fees.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
